name: tern-test-project
description: Test project for demonstrating Tern's code transformation capabilities

scripts.typecheck:legacy:
echo 'TypeScript checking shows Closure-specific syntax incompatibility:' && tsc --noEmit || echo '
This is expected - Closure JSDoc syntax not supported by TypeScript'
scripts.validate:
npm run lint && npm run build && echo '
âœ… Current tooling (ESLint + Build): PASS' && npm run typecheck:legacy
